ra#jaqta(gm) hira#NyamaBavaqt tasmA$d-rajaqta(gm) hira#NyamadakShiqNyama#Sruqja(gm) hi yO baqrq.hiShiq dadA#ti puqrA&sya# saM~MvathsaqrAd gRuqhE ru#dantiq tasmA$d- baqrq.hiShiq na dEyaq(gm)q sO$&gnira#bravId-BAqgya#sAqnyatha# va iqdamiti# punarAqdhEya#M tEq kEva#laqmitya#bruvan-nRuqddhnavaqt Kaluq sa itya#bravIqdyO 
ma#ddEvaqtya#maqgnimAqdadhA#tAq iti taM pUqShA&&dha#ttaq tEna# - [  ] 2
